docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ANDY WARHOL HATED hospitals, so when the pain in his upper abdomen came on, he turned to his chiropractor-nutritionist. The pain persisted, and a specialist who gave the 58-year-old Pop artist collagen injections for smoothing face wrinkles urged him to see an internist. On Feb. 18, 1987, Warhol was advised by his regular physician, Dr.
